name: voidauth
tagline: A self-hosted identity and authentication service
description: Voidauth is a self-hosted authentication and authorization service that handles user registration, login, and token-based access for multiple applications through a web UI and REST API.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Handle user registration, login, and password management for applications

features.title: REST API
features.description: Create and manage user accounts through web UI and API

features.title: Oauth2 Support
features.description: Provide OAuth2 authentication for third-party application integration

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Track active sessions and provide logout functionality

features.title: Password Policies
features.description: Enforce password complexity and expiration requirements
